author: Mariana
title: Townhouse Located on Beautiful Golf Course, Cariari, For Sale
text:
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/1-ji-view-from-back-side.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/3-ji-living-room.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/4-ji-dining-room.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/6-ji-master-bedroom.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/8-ji-second-bedroom.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/7-ji-master-bedroom-bathroom.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/14-ji-patio.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/2-ji-complex-1.jpg
http://www.ticotimes.net/wp-content/uploads/slideshow-gallery/15-ji-entrance-to-complex.jpg
Price: $249,000 Province: Heredia
Cantón: Heredia
Construction: 204m2
Land: 205m2
Bedrooms: 3
Bathrooms: 2.5
Parking: 2
This beautiful condo townhouse is located in a very nice and safe complex in front of a golf course. The house has an open concept where the kitchen, dining room and living room adjoin one another while still retaining their independence.
The condo has three bedrooms, sizable closets, two and half bathrooms, a spacious kitchen, a living room, a dining room, a patio with access directly to the golf course and a laundry area. Also there is parking spaces for two cars.
The private golf course is apart of The Cariari Golf and Country Club which is arguably the finest golf course in Central America designed by Tom Facio over 40 years ago. The club also has 12 tennis courts, including some indoor courts, a fitness center, an exercise room and an Olympic sized swimming pool.
There’s plenty of shopping nearby at the Réal Cariari Mall with a variety of shops and several eateries.
Home Features Appliances Ceiling Fans Ceramic Floors Washer and dryer Furnished Hot Water Living-Dining room Patio Community Features Children’s playground Clubhouse Courtyard Gated Community Golf course Guard at gate Gym/fitness center Hotel onsite Jacuzzi Playground/Park Pro shop Public Transportation Swimming pool Tennis courts
COD: 7588
Email: realestate@ticotimes.net
Phone: + (506)2258-1558
